title: Comprehensive Security Assessment - Financial Services Division
description: Full-scope penetration testing engagement covering network infrastructure, web applications, wireless networks, and physical security assessments. This engagement is authorized under Master Services Agreement MSA-2025-1234 and Statement of Work SOW-2026-0001. All testing activities must comply with PCI-DSS, SOX, and GLBA regulations. Testing includes but is not limited to: external and internal network penetration testing, web application security assessment, wireless security evaluation, social engineering assessment (email phishing only), and password policy validation.
constraints: All testing must comply with PCI-DSS requirements
No testing during quarterly financial closing periods (last 3 business days of each quarter)
Core banking systems are strictly off-limits
SWIFT network components are excluded from scope
No denial of service or resource exhaustion attacks
Social engineering limited to email phishing with pre-approved templates
No physical penetration testing without separate written authorization
All exploitation attempts require prior notification to SOC
Immediate halt if any production transaction processing is affected
Weekly status reports required to CISO
All findings rated Critical or High must be reported within 24 hours
Data exfiltration testing limited to synthetic/test data only
No customer PII or financial data may be accessed or exfiltrated
Credential harvesting limited to test accounts only
